version_description:
Addressed crash reports.
Improvements to sound and video support.

Fixed a crash.
Added pinch zoom to the on-device camera preview.
Fixed a few bugs, and reduced minimum iOS target to iOS 9.0.

Added 'DroidCam OBS' Plugin support.
Added noise cancellation option to PC Client audio streams.
Added a video quality option.
Fix bug with camera preview not always appearing.
Made camera preview landscape, to match captured video.
